Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class handles functionality in the GUI. The first tab allows a client to open an account. The second tab allows a client to deposit/withdraw/close and account. The third tab allows for management of Account activities including reading in files and printing Accounts.

  • Method Details

    • createAccount

      public Account createAccount(String[] commandArray)
      Helper method for loadAccounts() that will create an Account based on input from a File.
      Parameters:
      commandArray - a String array representation of the information of an Account
      Returns:
      Account object that can later be added to the AccountDatabase

    • createBranch

      public Branch createBranch(String branchName)
      Helper method for createAccount()/processActivities() that will create a Branch object based on String input.
      Parameters:
      branchName - name of Branch where holder wants to use Account
      Returns:
      Branch object which represents location of branch

    • createDate

      public Date createDate(String date)
      Creates a Date object based on a String input for File implementations.
      Parameters:
      date - String separated by '/' that represents date of birth
      Returns:
      Date object that represents date of birth

    • processActivities

      public void processActivities() throws IOException
      Processes account activities from a file selected by the user. The file is expected to contain lines of activity data in a specific format. Each line is parsed, and the corresponding account activity (deposit or withdrawal) is processed.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input/output error occurs while reading the file
